entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 a.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 6:11 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
